name: Ethylene phthalate polymers modified with 1,2,4,5-benzenetetracarboxylic dianhydride (pyromellitic dianhydride (PMDA; CAS Reg. No. 89-32-7)) and 1,3-butadiene, homopolymer, hydroxy-terminated (PBD; CAS Reg. No. 69102-90-5) used in conjunction with cobalt stearate
FoodContactSubstance: Ethylene phthalate polymers modified with 1,2,4,5-benzenetetracarboxylic dianhydride (pyromellitic dianhydride (PMDA; CAS Reg. No. 89-32-7)) and 1,3-butadiene, homopolymer, hydroxy-terminated (PBD; CAS Reg. No. 69102-90-5) used in conjunction with cobalt stearate (CAS Reg. No. 13586-84-0).
